MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんかいいもん持ってるか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝What's that nice thing you have there?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝What's that nice thing you have there?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんかだせ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Lemme see!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Lemme see!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「よかったらこうかんこしませんかー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Would you like to trade?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Would you like to trade?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「これ使わないかなぁ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Would that be useful to you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Would that be useful to you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「とれーどしましょー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Let's trade.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Let's trade.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだ、おねーさんのこれと交換したいか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Are you saying you want to trade with Onee-san?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Are you saying you want to trade with Onee-san?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「交換か？　いやいやわかっている仕方がない交換してやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝A trade? No, no, I understand, let's do it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝A trade? No, no, I understand, let's do it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ、どうかねトレードは」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmph, which one should I trade?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmph, which one should I trade?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「れっつ・ごー・ばーたー、なのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Rettsu go- baataa!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Rettsu go- baataa!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「備えあれば憂い無し！　こちらと交換はいかがでしょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Forewarned is forearmed. How about a trade?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Forewarned is forearmed. How about a trade?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぱじゃーるすたー（これをどうぞ）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Pozhaluista (Please accept this).❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Pozhaluista (Please accept this).❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「センパイっ！　ボクと交換してくださいっ！　…趣向を変えてみました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Senpai! Let's trade! ...I tried saying it for a change.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Senpai! Let's trade! ...I tried saying it for a change.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「直枝先輩！　お願いしますっ！　体育会系で攻めてみるのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Naoe-senpai! Thank you very much! ...I tried speaking like an underling.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Naoe-senpai! Thank you very much! ...I tried speaking like an underling.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ねぇねぇっ！　交換しようヨっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Hey, hey! Let's trade!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Hey, hey! Let's trade!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んっ！　いいもの持ってるねっ！　取りかえっこしよっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Oh! You have something nice! Let's make an exchange!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Oh! You have something nice! Let's make an exchange!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それ欲しいから変えてくんないかなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I want that, how about a trade?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I want that, how about a trade?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「私は交換を要求する！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I demand a trade!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I demand a trade!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「何も失わずに、何かを手に入れることはできないのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝You can't get something for nothing.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝You can't get something for nothing.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「世の中、ギブアンドテイクです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's all about give and take.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's all about give and take.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そ、それは幻の…い、いえ、なんでもありません。…要らないのなら、わたしに下さい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Th, that's the phantom... N, no, never mind... If you don't need it, please give it to me.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Th, that's the phantom... N, no, never mind... If you don't need it, please give it to me.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「オレの筋肉グッズはいかがかな？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Do you want my muscle supplements?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Do you want my muscle supplements?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「強くなりたいなら、オレの筋肉グッズが手っ取り早いぜ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝If you want to get stronger, it'd be faster to use my muscle supplements, y'know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝If you want to get stronger, it'd be faster to use my muscle supplements, y'know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はい、今日も筋肉です」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Alright, it's muscle today too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Alright, it's muscle today too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「はは、意外とおしゃれだろ。何かと交換したいか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Haha, I didn't think you had all this stuff. Do you want to trade?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Haha, I didn't think you had all this stuff. Do you want to trade?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なにか物欲しそうだな。何か交換するか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝You have something I want. Will you trade with me?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝You have something I want. Will you trade with me?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「らっしゃい、何か交換してくかい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Welcome, how about trading something?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Welcome, how about trading something?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「どうだい、いいもの揃えてるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think? I have some awesome stuff here.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What do you think? I have some awesome stuff here.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「うまうー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Umauu?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Umauu?❞

MESSAGE.JP: どれを交換しようか？
MESSAGE.EN: Which one do you want to trade?
MESSAGE.Translation: Which one do you want to trade?

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「ふふふ…ナイストレードだ…笑いが止まらない…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Fufufu... Nice trade... I can't stop laughing...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Fufufu... Nice trade... I can't stop laughing...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あいつすげー馬鹿じゃないか？　あんなもんと交換してくれるなんて」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Are you stupid? Why did you trade something like this?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Are you stupid? Why did you trade something like this?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「ありがとうー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Thaaanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Thaaanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うん、役に立ててよかったよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Yeah, I'm glad if it's of use to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Yeah, I'm glad if it's of use to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「大切に使ってねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Take good care of it, okay?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Take good care of it, okay?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「べりべりさんきゅーだよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Berry, berry thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Berry, berry thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「大切に使うといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You must take good care of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You must take good care of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、まあこんなもんだろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, well, that's it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, well, that's it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「等価交換というやつさ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝That's a fair exchange.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝That's a fair exchange.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「交換ありがとうございますー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thanks for the traaade.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thanks for the traaade.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「付喪神が宿るまで大切にしてくださいねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Please treasure it until it turns into a tsukumogami.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Please treasure it until it turns into a tsukumogami.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー、すぱしーばー（どういたしまして）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuuu, spasibo (Thank you).❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuuu, spasibo (Thank you).❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「センパイ、ウス！　ありがとうございましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Cheers, senpai! Thank you!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Cheers, senpai! Thank you!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「直枝先輩！　ありがとうございますっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Naoe-senpai! Thank you very much!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Naoe-senpai! Thank you very much!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「やはは、ありがとねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Yahaha, thanks.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Yahaha, thanks.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「交換してくれるなんて優しいなぁ…うう、はるちん泣けてきた」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're so kind to trade with me... Haruchin is moved to tears.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're so kind to trade with me... Haruchin is moved to tears.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「秘蔵の品物だから大事にしてねっ！　絶対だぞっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝It's my treasure, so take good care of it! Promise me!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝It's my treasure, so take good care of it! Promise me!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はるちんは嬉しそうに微笑んだ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Haruchin smiles happily.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Haruchin smiles happily.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「大切にしないと…ああ、それ以上はわたしの口からは言えません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you don't take good care of it... I shall say no more.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you don't take good care of it... I shall say no more.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…目指せ、わらしべ長者」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...You'll be a Straw Millionaire, go for it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...You'll be a Straw Millionaire, go for it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「さて、部屋に戻ってゆっくりと味わうことにしましょうか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Okay, I will go back to my room to savor its flavor.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Okay, I will go back to my room to savor its flavor.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「ありがとよ。いい筋肉でまた会おう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Thanks. We shall meet again under a good muscle.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Thanks. We shall meet again under a good muscle.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はっ、またまたおだてるなって。じゃあ、また筋肉で」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Hah, stop flattering me. Well, see your muscle later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Hah, stop flattering me. Well, see your muscle later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「大事に使ってくれよ。サンキュー。さらばだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Take good care of it. Thank you and farewell.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Take good care of it. Thank you and farewell.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「俺のほうが得したみたいだな。おまえがいいならそれでいいがな。ありがとう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It looks like it was more beneficial for me. But if you're okay with this, I don't mind. Thank you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It looks like it was more beneficial for me. But if you're okay with this, I don't mind. Thank you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「はっは、おしゃれになったじゃないか。よかったよかった。じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Haha, it will definitely help you. Awesome, awesome. I'll catch you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Haha, it will definitely help you. Awesome, awesome. I'll catch you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「ありがとよ。またきてくれよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Thanks. See you again later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Thanks. See you again later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「はりゃほれよ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Harya hore...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Harya hore...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにぃ…これのよさがわからんなんて人としてどうかと思うぞ？　ったく…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Say what... How can you not understand the greatness of this? Honestly...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Say what... How can you not understand the greatness of this? Honestly...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「おまえこれ、すげー欲しそうに見てたのにな、要らなかったのか。なんだ、早く言ってくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝So you didn't need that, even though you looked like you really wanted it? You should have said so earlier.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝So you didn't need that, even though you looked like you really wanted it? You should have said so earlier.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、しょうがないねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hm... Oh well.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hm... Oh well.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「が、がーん…余計なことだったのか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Oh dear... You didn't need it～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Oh dear... You didn't need it～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「しょんぼり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Bummer...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Bummer...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「おねーさんの誘いを断るとは…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You have nerve refusing Onee-san's offer...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You have nerve refusing Onee-san's offer...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「いらんのか？　まあいいが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝You don't need that? Oh, as you wish.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝You don't need that? Oh, as you wish.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「気に食わんな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Is it not to your liking?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Is it not to your liking?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「うう、要らないですか？　らじゃーなのです…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uu, you don't need it? Roger...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uu, you don't need it? Roger...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そうですか、しょうがないですね。のーじんじゃー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Really? It can't be helped then, it's no ginger...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Really? It can't be helped then, it's no ginger...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「わふー、いずう゛ぇにーちー（すみません）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Wafuu, izvinite (I'm sorry).❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Wafuu, izvinite (I'm sorry).❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ボクではダメでしたかー。…この趣向は向いてませんね、わふー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝It was no good..? This idea of mine...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝It was no good..? This idea of mine...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「センパイ、ごめんなさい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sorry, senpai...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sorry, senpai...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「直枝先輩、ごめんなさい…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm sorry, Naoe-senpai...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm sorry, Naoe-senpai...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「うう…ひどいよー。ぐすん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Uu... You're horrible. Sob.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Uu... You're horrible. Sob.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「えー…ダメなの？　どうしてもダメ？　そっか…しょぼん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝What... Are you sure? Are you really sure? Okay... You broke my heart.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝What... Are you sure? Are you really sure? Okay... You broke my heart.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ま、しょうがないねっ。そんなときもあるさっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Well, it can't be helped. This kind of thing happens too.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Well, it can't be helped. This kind of thing happens too.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そんないぢわるゆーなんて、ふんふーんだっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I never thought you could be that mean!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I never thought you could be that mean!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…ショックです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm shocked.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm shocked.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「この展開は予想していませんでした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I didn't expect this turn of events.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I didn't expect this turn of events.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…泣いてなんかいませんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I'm not crying.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I'm not crying.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「なにぃ？　おっと動揺はしてませんよ。むしろ、そう来ると思ってたぜ…じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Whaat? No, I'm perfectly fine. Actually, I knew you'd say so... See ya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Whaat? No, I'm perfectly fine. Actually, I knew you'd say so... See ya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ…これナシで生きていく気かよっ。正気かよ…わかったよ…じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝You think you can live without that...? Are you serious...? Alright... Later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝You think you can live without that...? Are you serious...? Alright... Later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「なんだ、つれない奴だな。まあ、いい。じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Why are you so cold? Oh well, see you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Why are you so cold? Oh well, see you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「やはりこれはおしゃれが過ぎたか…またな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝So it was stylish for you after all... Later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝So it was stylish for you after all... Later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんだって？　まあ確かにこんなものいらねーよな。じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Say what? Well, I'm not surprised you don't need it. Bye.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Say what? Well, I'm not surprised you don't need it. Bye.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「なんだって？　結構使えるんだがな、まあ仕方ねぇ。じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Say what? It's pretty useful. Alright, see you around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Say what? It's pretty useful. Alright, see you around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「はらたいら！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Hara Taira!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Hara Taira!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「はりれるぅら！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Harirerua!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Harirerua!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「こいつ、おまえにぴったりじゃないか？　すごく馴染んでるぞ？　やろうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This was made just for you. You'll definitely like it. Do you want it? You do, right?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This was made just for you. You'll definitely like it. Do you want it? You do, right?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「実はこんなものが余っている。やろうか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝I have a spare, do you want one?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝I have a spare, do you want one?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、これあげるよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Hm... I'll give you this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Hm... I'll give you this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「プレゼントですよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝It's a present～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝It's a present～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「受け取ってくださいなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Please accept it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Please accept it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「まあ、何もないならこれをもっていけ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Well, if you don't have anything, take this.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Well, if you don't have anything, take this.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「これをやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝I'll give you that.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝I'll give you that.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「跪いて受け取れ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Kneel down and accept it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Kneel down and accept it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「あい・うぃる・ぷれぜんと・ふぉー・ゆー！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I will presento foo yoou!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I will presento foo yoou!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「意外と使えると思うのですが」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I think it's pretty useful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I think it's pretty useful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「もらってくれるとうれしいのです、わふー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'll be happy if you accept this, wafuu.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'll be happy if you accept this, wafuu.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「にーちゃー、にーちゃー、ぼくのうけとってー。…甘えてみましたっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Nii-chan, Nii-chan, don't forget to take this! ...I tried fawning.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Nii-chan, Nii-chan, don't forget to take this! ...I tried fawning.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「これもう要らないからあげる！　みもふたもなっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I don't need that anymore! You know what I'm getting at.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I don't need that anymore! You know what I'm getting at.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「んっ！　はるちんひらめいた！　これが必要になるねっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Mm! Haruchin got an idea! You will need this!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Mm! Haruchin got an idea! You will need this!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「はるちんはえぶりでー・おみなえし！　…あれ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Everyday Haruchin is a Yellow Patrinia! ...Err?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Everyday Haruchin is a Yellow Patrinia! ...Err?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「あはは。これ、受け取ってくれるとうれしいな…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Ahaha. I'll be happy if you take that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Ahaha. I'll be happy if you take that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたし、あげる人。あなた、もらう人…みたいな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I'm the benefactor. You're the beneficiary... It seems.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I'm the benefactor. You're the beneficiary... It seems.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「捨ててしまうと、もったいないお化けが出てきますから」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝The leftover monster will come for me if I throw it away.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝The leftover monster will come for me if I throw it away.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「わたしには使いこなせないので、差し上げます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's useless for me so I give it to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's useless for me so I give it to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「こいつが余ってるんだが、おまえならいけそうだな。どうだ？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I have no need for this, but maybe you can put it to use. What say you?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I have no need for this, but maybe you can put it to use. What say you?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、誕生日いつだったっけか。とにかく遅いか早い誕生日プレゼントだ。やろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝When's your birthday? Anyway, it might be too early or too late, but here's your birthday present.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝When's your birthday? Anyway, it might be too early or too late, but here's your birthday present.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「恋人はサンタクロース。ほら、これやるぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I'm your Santa. Come on, take it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I'm your Santa. Come on, take it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「これは俺にはおしゃれすぎるな…よし、これをおまえにやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝This is too stylish for me... Alright, I'll give it to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝This is too stylish for me... Alright, I'll give it to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「こいつが余ってたな…よし、これをおまえにやろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I have no need for this... Alright, I'll give it to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I have no need for this... Alright, I'll give it to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「こいつ、おまえにぴったりだよ、似合うよ、もってけよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's a perfect fit for you, take it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's a perfect fit for you, take it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「こいつがおまえのことを呼んでる…惜しいがやるぜっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It's calling out to you... It's breaking my heart, but I'll give it to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It's calling out to you... It's breaking my heart, but I'll give it to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「うままうー？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Umamauu?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Umamauu?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「今日からこれがおまえのラッキーアイテムだ、ずっと持っててくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝It's going to be your lucky item from today on, don't ever let go of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝It's going to be your lucky item from today on, don't ever let go of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「あたしでは宝の持ち腐れだからな、うん、おまえにぴったりだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝This is of no use to me, but yep, it suits you great.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝This is of no use to me, but yep, it suits you great.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「お礼なんていいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝No need to thank me～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝No need to thank me～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「喜んでもらえてうれしいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I'm glad you like it～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I'm glad you like it～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「じゃあまたあとでねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well, I'll see you later～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well, I'll see you later～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なあに、礼はいらん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Keep your gratitude to yourself.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Keep your gratitude to yourself.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「だが次に会えば容赦はせん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝But don't expect me to go easy on you next time our paths cross.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝But don't expect me to go easy on you next time our paths cross.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「フフフ…大事にするといい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Fufufu... Take good care of it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Fufufu... Take good care of it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いえいえ。お気になさらず」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, no, no. It's no big deal.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, no, no. It's no big deal.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「いえいえ。お気遣いなく」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝No, no. Don't let it bother you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝No, no. Don't let it bother you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「こちらこそ、どーもなのです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I should be the one thanking you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I should be the one thanking you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「にーちゃー、ありがと！　…なのですっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Thank you, Nii-chan!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Thank you, Nii-chan!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どういたしまして！　役立ててねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝You're welcome! I hope it'll be useful to you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝You're welcome! I hope it'll be useful to you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「どんな風に役に立ったかあとでおしえてねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Let me know later if it was of use to you～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Let me know later if it was of use to you～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それが、全てを変える…なれーたー・ばい・はるちん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝With this, everything changed... Narrated by Haruchin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝With this, everything changed... Narrated by Haruchin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ありがと。受け取ってくれて、すごく嬉しい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Thanks. I'm so glad you accepted it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Thanks. I'm so glad you accepted it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お礼を言われるほどのことでもありません」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝It's not something you should thank me for.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝It's not something you should thank me for.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「タダより高いものはない。…いえ、なんでもありませんよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I got it for free... I mean, never mind.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I got it for free... I mean, never mind.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「お役に立つならば、幸いです」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I can only hope it'll be useful.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I can only hope it'll be useful.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「それはもう、おまえの肉体の一部だ。使いこなしてくれ。じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's now a part of your body. Make good use of it. Talk to you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's now a part of your body. Make good use of it. Talk to you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「誕生日のプレゼントだからな、今日から愛用しろよ。じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's your birthday present, make good use of it. Talk to you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's your birthday present, make good use of it. Talk to you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「サンタクロースからの贈り物だからな、ずっと愛用しろよ。じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝It's a present from Santa, make good use of it. Talk to you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝It's a present from Santa, make good use of it. Talk to you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「へえ、意外とおまえそういうの似合うんだな。よかった。じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Wow, it actually looks good on you. I'm glad. See you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Wow, it actually looks good on you. I'm glad. See you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「はっは、おしゃれになったじゃないか。よかったよかった。じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Haha, it looks great on you. Awesome, awesome. See you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Haha, it looks great on you. Awesome, awesome. See you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「そいつと共に生き抜いてくれ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝It will help you with your survival.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝It will help you with your survival.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「肌身離さず持っていてくれよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Always carry it with you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Always carry it with you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「ほーりゃはれひれうーっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Horya hare hireuu!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Horya hare hireuu!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「人のこーいをあほかっ！　もーあっちいく！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Way to be ungrateful! I'm off!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Way to be ungrateful! I'm off!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なにぃ…これを断るなんて人としておかしいぞ…もーあっちいく！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Say what... Something's definitely not right with you if you don't want that... I'm off!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Say what... Something's definitely not right with you if you don't want that... I'm off!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「うーん、しょうがないねぇ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Well, it can't be helped.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Well, it can't be helped.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「が、がーん…余計なことだったのか～」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Sh, shock... to think you didn't need it～...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Sh, shock... to think you didn't need it～...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「しょんぼり…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝So sad...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝So sad...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「なんだと？　断るのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝What? You're not taking it?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝What? You're not taking it?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「それでいいのか？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Are you sure about that?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Are you sure about that?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「…まあ、それもよかろう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝...Well, so be it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝...Well, so be it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「ふむ、ならば仕方あるまい」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm, there's no helping it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Hmm, there's no helping it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「そ。そうですか、仕舞いますね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I, I see... I'll put it away...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I, I see... I'll put it away...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「や、やっぱりこんなの変ですよね…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I, I knew it was weird after all...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I, I knew it was weird after all...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「す、すみません、ダメダメワンコで…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I'm, I'm sorry for being such a useless doggy...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I'm, I'm sorry for being such a useless doggy...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「うう、にーちゃーがいぢわるするー…いじけてみました」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Uuh, Nii-chan, you're so mean... I tried acting timid.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Uuh, Nii-chan, you're so mean... I tried acting timid.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「そうかぁ…役に立つと思うんだけどなぁ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Okay... I just thought it'd be useful...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Okay... I just thought it'd be useful...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「押しつけるのはよくないか。ごめんねっ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝I shouldn't have pestered you. Sorry.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝I shouldn't have pestered you. Sorry.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「それが、全ての発端だった…なれーたー・ばい・はるちん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝That was the beginning of everything... Narrated by Haruchin.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝That was the beginning of everything... Narrated by Haruchin.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「ぐすん。恨んでやる呪ってやる祟ってやる。えぐえぐ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Sob. Curse you, curse you to hell!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Sob. Curse you, curse you to hell!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「…やっぱり、いらないですよね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝...I knew you wouldn't need it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝...I knew you wouldn't need it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「仕方ありません。他を当たりましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝Never mind. I will go ask someone else.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝Never mind. I will go ask someone else.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「人生、チャンスは一度きりですよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝In life, you only get one chance.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝In life, you only get one chance.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「えぇ…なんてつれねえ…くそぉ…大丈夫だ…生きてける…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝No way... You're so unfriendly... Damn... I'm fine... I can live with that...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝No way... You're so unfriendly... Damn... I'm fine... I can live with that...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「えぇ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝No way...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝No way...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「やはりこれはおしゃれが過ぎたか…またな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝It was too stylish for you after all...? See you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝It was too stylish for you after all...? See you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「おまえ前にこれ欲しいって言ってたじゃないかっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Didn't you tell me you want this before!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Didn't you tell me you want this before!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「ほわっつはぷん」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝HWHATSHAPPEN.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝HWHATSHAPPEN.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「なんだ、どーしておまえこんなところにいるんだ？　あたしはこっちだから、じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Huh, what are you doing here? I'll go this way. See you later.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Huh, what are you doing here? I'll go this way. See you later.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「テヅカを知らないか？　もちろん猫だ。猫以外ありえない名前だろ。テヅッチどこ行ったんだ…？　じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Have you seen Tezuka? Of course I'm talking about the cat. Who else could have a name like that? Tezucchi, where did you go...? Well, laters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Have you seen Tezuka? Of course I'm talking about the cat. Who else could have a name like that? Tezucchi, where did you go...? Well, laters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `鈴@「コバーンを知らないか？　もちろん猫だ。猫以外ありえない名前だろ。コバどこ行ったんだ…？　じゃあな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Rin@❝Have you seen Cobain? Of course I'm talking about the cat. Who else could have a name like that? Coby, where did you go...? Well, laters.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Rin@❝Have you seen Cobain? Of course I'm talking about the cat. Who else could have a name like that? Coby, where did you go...? Well, laters.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「今日はいい天気ですねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Great weather today～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Great weather today～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「今度みんなで遊園地に行きたいよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝I want to go to an amusement park with everyone～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝I want to go to an amusement park with everyone～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `小毬@「あとで一緒にお菓子食べよー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Komari@❝Let's go have some snacks together.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Komari@❝Let's go have some snacks together.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「世間話か。余裕だなキミも」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Gossiping, huh? You have too much time on your hands.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Gossiping, huh? You have too much time on your hands.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「うむ、それより小毬君やクドリャフカ君は見なかったかね」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, but more importantly, have you seen Komari-kun or Kudryavka-kun?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝Umu, but more importantly, have you seen Komari-kun or Kudryavka-kun?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `来ヶ谷@「仕方ないな。カフェテラスでも行ってサボるか」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kurugaya@❝It can't be helped. Let's cut classes and go to the sidewalk cafe.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kurugaya@❝It can't be helped. Let's cut classes and go to the sidewalk cafe.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ぐっどうぇざーですねー。ひなたぼっこしたいですー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Guddo weather, isn't it? I want to get a tan～.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Guddo weather, isn't it? I want to get a tan～.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「今日一日あなたが幸運に恵まれますように」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝I will pray that today will be a good day for you.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝I will pray that today will be a good day for you.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `クド@「ふしーぼーはろーしーぼー（グッドラック！）」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kud@❝Fushiibo Haroshiboo (Good luck)!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kud@❝Fushiibo Haroshiboo (Good luck)!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「今日はー、トラップの日だね！　知ってた？」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Today is Trap Day! Did'ya know?❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Today is Trap Day! Did'ya know?❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「たまにはイレギュラーがあってもいいよねー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Irregularities can be good too sometimes.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Irregularities can be good too sometimes.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「マフィンでも焼きにいこうかなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Guess I should go bake some muffins.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Guess I should go bake some muffins.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「スコーンでも焼きにいこうかなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Guess I should go bake some scones.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Guess I should go bake some scones.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `葉留佳@「シフォンケーキの練習でもしようかなー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Haruka@❝Guess I should practice making a chiffon cake.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Haruka@❝Guess I should practice making a chiffon cake.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらくの間、西園さんと世間話を交わした。
MESSAGE.EN: I talked with Nishizono-san for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: I talked with Nishizono-san for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「なかなか有意義な一時でした」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝That was an insightful discussion.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝That was an insightful discussion.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「興味があるなら、今度お貸ししましょう」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝If you're interested, I can lend it to you next time.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝If you're interested, I can lend it to you next time.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `西園@「そろそろ戻らないと、見逃してしまいます」
MESSAGE.EN: `Nishizono@❝I have to go now, or I'm going to miss it.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Nishizono@❝I have to go now, or I'm going to miss it.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらくの間、真人と世間話を交わした。
MESSAGE.EN: I talked with Masato for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: I talked with Masato for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「まあ、そうだな…おまえの筋肉論にも一理あり、だ。否定はしねぇぜ？　じゃ、またな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Well, what can I say... Your Muscle Theory seems to make some valid points. I'm not denying that, okay? Well, see you around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Well, what can I say... Your Muscle Theory seems to make some valid points. I'm not denying that, okay? Well, see you around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「はっは、そりゃ筋肉様々ってもんだったな。じゃ、またな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Haha, there are all kinds of muscles. Well, see you around.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Haha, there are all kinds of muscles. Well, see you around.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「そいつはちょっと頂けねぇ筋肉だな…ちょっと摘ませろよ。じゃ、またな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝I don't like the looks of this muscle... Let me pinch it. Well, see ya.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝I don't like the looks of this muscle... Let me pinch it. Well, see ya.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `真人@「おまえ、そこで筋肉でいったのかよっ、どこまで筋肉を推すんだよ…おっと時間だ、じゃまたな」
MESSAGE.EN: `Masato@❝Are you using your muscle there? Are you loyal enough to your muscle? ...Oh, I gotta go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Masato@❝Are you using your muscle there? Are you loyal enough to your muscle? ...Oh, I gotta go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: しばらくの間、謙吾と世間話を交わした。
MESSAGE.EN: I talked with Kengo for a while.
MESSAGE.Translation: I talked with Kengo for a while.

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「そうだな、真人の馬鹿は天然記念物として保護すべきだな。あまり人が触れてはいけないものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Yeah, Masato is so silly he should be made into a protected species. Other people shouldn't be let in contact with him.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Yeah, Masato is so silly he should be made into a protected species. Other people shouldn't be let in contact with him.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「修学旅行では木刀を忘れずに買わなくてはな。あれを忘れたら思い出も忘れるようなものだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝I must buy a wooden sword when we go on the field trip. If I don't get one, there won't be any fond memories to actually look back at.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝I must buy a wooden sword when we go on the field trip. If I don't get one, there won't be any fond memories to actually look back at.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `謙吾@「ほぅ、そいつはラッキーだったな。だが俺は実力だけで進む。この無駄なく鍛えられた肉体と技でだ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kengo@❝Hoo, you've been lucky. But I will pave my way using my own strength. With this body and skill that I've honed for that purpose.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kengo@❝Hoo, you've been lucky. But I will pave my way using my own strength. With this body and skill that I've honed for that purpose.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「え？　マスク？　斉藤？　しらねーな、っと時間だ、俺はいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝What? Mask? Saito? Whatever are you talking about... oh alas, I gotta go now.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝What? Mask? Saito? Whatever are you talking about... oh alas, I gotta go now.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よう、理樹。暇そうにしてんな。もっと遊べよ？　っと、俺はいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. You look bored, wanna play? Oh alas, I gotta go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. You look bored, wanna play? Oh alas, I gotta go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よう、理樹。そんなに勉強して楽しいか？　気楽にいこうぜ？っと、俺はいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. Is it fun to be studying all the time? Why don't you take it easy? Oh alas, I gotta go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. Is it fun to be studying all the time? Why don't you take it easy? Oh alas, I gotta go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よう、理樹。うまい話があんだよ、あ、これ秘密な、っと時間だ、俺はいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. Listen, I have good news, but keep it a secret... oh alas, I gotta go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. Listen, I have good news, but keep it a secret... oh alas, I gotta go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よう、理樹。やばい話があるんだよ、聞くよな？　絶対秘密な、っと時間だ、俺はいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. Listen, I have bad news, but keep it a secret... oh alas, I gotta go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. Listen, I have bad news, but keep it a secret... oh alas, I gotta go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「よう、理樹。ウチの妹はどうだ？　気だてはいいと思うんだ。他がアレだけどな、っと時間だ、俺はいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. What do you think about my sister? I think she has a good attitude, but there are some problems with everything else... oh alas, I gotta go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Yo, Riki. What do you think about my sister? I think she has a good attitude, but there are some problems with everything else... oh alas, I gotta go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `恭介@「理樹、戦いをエンジョイしてるかい。おまえならやれる。きっとな。じゃあ俺はいくぜ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, are you enjoying the fights? I know you can do it. I'm sure of it. Oh alas, I gotta go.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Kyousuke@❝Riki, are you enjoying the fights? I know you can do it. I'm sure of it. Oh alas, I gotta go.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「結構このキャラ疲れるんだぜ…」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝I'm starting to get tired of this character...❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝I'm starting to get tired of this character...❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「はれほれっ！」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Hare Hore!❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Hare Hore!❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「はーらたいーらー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Taaira Haara.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Taaira Haara.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「もいーかいまだだぅーよ」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Reeeadea ornot, heere I come.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Reeeadea ornot, heere I come.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「いーからかねかーせー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝C'moooon, giiime moooney.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝C'moooon, giiime moooney.❞

MESSAGE.JP: `マスクザ斉藤@「とーまとでもくーかー」
MESSAGE.EN: `Mask the Saito@❝Waaana my tomaato.❞
MESSAGE.Translation: `Mask the Saito@❝Waaana my tomaato.❞

SELECT.JP: 交換に応じる$d交換に応じない
持ち物を貰う$d持ち物を貰わない
